forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 16C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 60F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near 15C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 55F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
